setDragons(ArrayList<Dragon>) - Method in class gamelogic.Game

setGameMode(String) - Method in class gamelogic.Game
Sets the game mode that defines the dragons' behavior "0" makes the dragons move "1" makes the dragons move and sleep "2" makes the dragons stand still
